snippet.title: Hardline - Video Game preview trailer. PC/MAC (1995)
snippet.description:
Hardline - Video Game preview trailer.
Developed by Cryo Interactive
Published by Virgin Interactive Entertainment in 1997 for PC (DOS and Windows)  and Macintosh.

Year : 1997
System : PC (DOS and Windows),  Macintosh

Video from the Virgin Interactive 'Hypergames' CD-ROM catalog (1995)
